javascript:(function()%7B(function()%7Bfor(var%20e%2Cn%2Ct%3D!1%2Ca%3Ddocument.body.getElementsByTagName(%22b%22)%2Co%3D0%3Ba.length%3Eo%3Bo%2B%2B)%7Bif(%22ISBN-10%3A%22%3D%3Da%5Bo%5D.innerText)%7Bn%3Da%5Bo%5D.parentNode.innerText.slice(9)%2Ct%3D!0%2Ce%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.jp%2Fgp%2Fsearch%2F%3Ffield-isbn%3D%22%3Bbreak%7Dif(%22ASIN%3A%22%3D%3Da%5Bo%5D.innerText)%7Bn%3Da%5Bo%5D.parentNode.innerText.slice(6)%2Ct%3D!0%2Ce%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.co.jp%2Fdp%2F%22%3Bbreak%7D%7Dif(t)%7Bvar%20i%3Dwindow.open(e%2Bescape(n))%3Bi.focus()%7Delse%20alert(%22ISBN%2FASIN%20not%20found%22)%7D)()%3B%7D)()
